title: Moons of Ardan
description: Embark on a space city-building adventure in Moons of Ardan! Develop a thriving civilization in a real-time planetary system. Oversee production chains, cater to the needs of your axonauts, recover their lost technologies, and navigate resource transportation.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Moons of Ardan is an exciting exploration, **city-builder**, and colony simulation game set in **space**. This indie gem, allows you to expand your civilization across the moons of a **real-time simulated** planetary system, growing a small band of stranded Axonauts into a **multi-lunar space-faring society**.

<!--image-->
![Moons of Ardan-y67ac](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/980fff8dfbee4d1cb1bc8f0d68ea7bbb/moons-of-ardan-y67ac.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Key Features
<!--text-->
- **Unique blend of city-building and resource management:** Similar to the acclaimed Anno series, but with the added complexity of a dynamic, simulated planetary system.
- **Visually Stunning Experience:** Experience spacecraft flying by and planets rising on the horizon, showcasing the growth and development of your settlements.
- **Dynamic planetary ecosystem:** Presents ecological challenges and opportunities for experimentation, demanding careful management for a sustainable colony.

<!--image-->
![Moons of Ardan-1c73j](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/980fff8dfbee4d1cb1bc8f0d68ea7bbb/moons-of-ardan-1c73j.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Story
<!--text-->
*In the year 2124, the once hopeful voyage of the Axonauts had become an endless odyssey through the abyss of space.*

*For generations, these humanoid beings had called a massive, self-sustaining spaceship their home. Each passing year deepened their uncertainty and eroded their hope, leaving them adrift in the void of the universe.*

*Then, on an unforeseen day, destiny took a twist. Their massive spaceship collided with an uncharted celestial body, an enigmatic moon they would come to call Velaa.*

*Stranded, with no way to continue their search for the new home they longed for, they will settle on Velaa. They have to forge a new existence, constructing a base from the moon's resources and mastering the art of producing their sustenance.*

*In this alien world, hope rekindled, but the path ahead was a treacherous one, fraught with the unknown, and they were determined to meet it head-on.*

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Gameplay
<!--text-->
In Moons of Ardan, you'll take charge of a resilient civilization of Axonauts, stranded on a remote moon in the vast expanse of space. Your mission? It's simple yet monumental: build a thriving society that spans multiple moons, and ultimately, erect a breathtaking wonder that will stand as a testament to your ingenuity and leadership.

But achieving this won't be easy. You'll need to roll up your sleeves and dive into the nitty-gritty of city-building. From managing crucial resources to setting up intricate production chains, every decision you make will shape the destiny of your colony.

<!--image-->
![Moons of Ardan-1odpp](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/980fff8dfbee4d1cb1bc8f0d68ea7bbb/moons-of-ardan-1odpp.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
As your population grows, so too will the challenges you face. Balancing their needs against the limited resources of the moon will test your strategic prowess. But fear not! With careful planning and foresight, you'll overcome every obstacle in your path.

And the adventure doesn't stop there! Explore neighbouring moons, unlock groundbreaking technologies, and establish vital trade routes to fuel the expansion of your settlements.

But beware of the environmental challenges that lie ahead. Pollution and other ecological threats will require your attention as you strive to maintain a sustainable and prosperous colony.

As you progress through the game, new opportunities will arise. From mastering energy management to colonizing asteroids with robotic workers, Ardanâ€™s system is yours to conquer.

<!--image-->
![Moons of Ardan-1h2sq](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/980fff8dfbee4d1cb1bc8f0d68ea7bbb/moons-of-ardan-1h2sq.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
With its immersive real-time planetary system, diverse population progression, and a wealth of buildings to construct, Moons of Ardan offers an unforgettable city-building experience like no other.

So, what are you waiting for? The stars are calling, and your destiny awaits! Join me in Moons of Ardan, and together, let's build a civilization that will echo through the cosmos for eons to come!

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Exploration and Environment:
<!--text-->
- **Handcrafted Planetary System:** Explore a dynamic system featuring a gas giant, 3 habitable moons, and 4 asteroids.
- **Immersive Visuals:** Witness breathtaking planetary views that evolve alongside your settlements.
- **Dynamic Ecosystem: **Manage a complex ecosystem with various resources, addressing the pollution challenge for aesthetic considerations or optimal gameplay.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Civilization Development:
<!--text-->
- **Population Progression:** Witness your civilization progress through 4 distinct stages, unlocking new possibilities.
- **Extensive Building Options:** Construct and upgrade over 60 unique buildings, each with specific functions.
- **Technological Advancements:** Unlock over 65 technologies across 6 science types to enhance your capabilities.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Production and Resource Management:
<!--text-->
- **Diverse Resources:** Manage over 45 types of resources to fuel your rapidly growing colony.
- **Challenging production chains:** Put your resource management and optimization skills to the test.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Advanced Colony Management:
<!--text-->
- **Energy Management:** Balance energy needs and production layout for enhanced control over production chains, while also being challenged to reconsider your colony layouts.
- **Space Trade Routes:** Establish trade routes between colonies for smooth resource management.
- **Factory Slot System:** Exercise precise control over building production by limiting the number of workers for further optimization.
- **Job Prioritization: **Identify buildings needing special attention for optimal resource management.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Customization:
<!--text-->
- **Organic City-Building:** Design and construct settlements to suit your playstyle with a gridless and organic system.
- **Flexible Gameplay:** Play at your own pace, pausing the game anytime to plan and strategize.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Immersion and Engagement:
<!--text-->
- **Original Soundtrack:** Enjoy a captivating tailor-made soundtrack composed by Christophe Hubermont.
- **Engaging Narrative:** Embark on a story-driven mission system for continued objectives.
- **Comprehensive Tutorial:** Seamlessly learn the ropes with a tutorial integrated into the narrative, ensuring accessibility for players new to the city-building.
